metadata.title: CVE-2019-19919 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Versions of handlebars prior to 4.3.0 are vulnerable to Prototype Pollution leading to Remote Code Execution. Templates may alter an Object's __proto__ and __defineGetter__ properties, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code through crafted payloads.

criterions.comment: node-handlebars package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3:4.5.3-1').
